name: Sombrio Cadence Bib Liner Shorts - Women's
description: No one likes a sore butt. These bib liner shorts feature a premium chamois to add extra comfort in the saddle. Super stretchy and hell-yeah comfy, just throw on your favourite riding shorts, and go.High waist with smooth bib design reduces slippage.Ergonomic patterning combines two types of material for great breathability and mobility.Female-specific Formula chamois improves comfort in the saddle.Poron® foam technology provides excellent vibration dampening.Flat stitching reduces chaffing.Base layer fit.
